title: [Caffe2] Add support to TensorRT
body_html:
Adding new PR as our C2 repo has merged into pytorch. Old PR at caffe2/caffe2#2443.

This PR adds an TensorRT operator and the graph cutting algorithm to cut a portion of "runnable" subgraph off input c2 net and off-load it to TensorRT to run. Some of the flow is still in Python but can be easily ported to C++.

To build:

cd build
cmake .. -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF  -DBUILD_TEST=OFF -DBUILD_BENCHMARK=OFF -DBUILD_BINARY=OFF  -DUSE_CUDA=ON -DTENSORRT_ROOT=/opt/tensorrt -DUSE_TENSORRT=ON -DBUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF=OFF

To test:

cd caffe2/python/trt
TEST_C2_TRT=1 pytest -v test_trt.py

TODO outside of this PR:

  • Generic graph cutting/transforming algorithm with nomnigraph
  • Workspace based initializer flow instead of relying on init_net
  • On-the-fly RunNet conversion
  • C++ version of SSA rewrite

body:
Adding new PR as our C2 repo has merged into pytorch. Old PR at https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/pull/2443. 

This PR adds an TensorRT operator and the graph cutting algorithm to cut a portion of "runnable" subgraph off input c2 net and off-load it to TensorRT to run. Some of the flow is still in Python but can be easily ported to C++.

To build:
```
cd build
cmake .. -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF  -DBUILD_TEST=OFF -DBUILD_BENCHMARK=OFF -DBUILD_BINARY=OFF  -DUSE_CUDA=ON -DTENSORRT_ROOT=/opt/tensorrt -DUSE_TENSORRT=ON -DBUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF=OFF
```

To test:
```
cd caffe2/python/trt
TEST_C2_TRT=1 pytest -v test_trt.py
```
TODO outside of this PR:
- Generic graph cutting/transforming algorithm with nomnigraph
- Workspace based initializer flow instead of relying on init_net
- On-the-fly RunNet conversion
- C++ version of SSA rewrite
